body.head: pre-main bodily header, incl. img, h1 heading, and nav

div1.head: This is my pre-articular main header text. This exact document is for the purpose of developing fluency with the Text Encoding Initiative's "P5: Guidelines for Electronic Text Encoding and Interchange." I believe they help with the qualification of content, which is an important part of my own developmental interest.

div2.head: articular h2 heading
div2.p-n1: Here's where I need to be more decisive about sectioning. Essentially, I'm working with the XHTML/HTML5 recommendations for outlining, plus TEI guidelines. I have to see what type of outline works for both.
